description: A project contains information about the overall project.
title: project_core

$schema.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

project_id.description: A unique ID for the project.

project_title.description: A summary of the project in a sentence.
project_title.example: A title of a grant proposal, publication, or poster. Approximately 30 words.

project_description.description: A longer description of the project which can include research goals and experimental approach.
project_description.example: An abstract from a grant application, publication, or poster. Approximately 300 words.
